casebody.data:
CENTRAL STATE COLLIERIES, Inc., v. NATIONAL BITUMINOUS COAL COMMISSION. No. 6562. Circuit Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Feb. 16, 1939.

Before SPARKS and MAJOR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Upon all the papers and proceedings heretofore had in this action, now, upon motion of the respondent, dated the 6th day of February, 1939.

It is hereby ordered that the order of this court dated the 17th day of February, 1938, granting an injunction pendente lite be set aside, and the injunction vacated, and the petition be, and the same hereby is dismissed, without costs to either party, on the ground that this cause has become moot.
